posts.post_content:
Posted By: Anonymous
I am wondering if anyone can help me.  A few years ago i went to a local hobby show and sale.  There i met an old farmer, probably in his 90s.  While there my brother and i got to looking at his baseball cards.  He told us the Allen @ Ginter cards were his when he was young.  I am wondering if the cards we bought for around $10 might be worth alot more! In particular i am wondering if these cards ever came with serrated edges? any info will be greatly appreciated

Posted By: barrysloate
If they have serrated edges they are modern reprints.
